for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    sum = 0
    for i in range(n):
        sum = sum + max(abs(a[i] - m), abs(a[i] - 1))
    print(sum)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    k = []
    for i in range(n):
        k.append(max(abs(m - l[i]), abs(1 - l[i])))
    print(sum(k))

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = [int(j) for j in input().split()]
    ans = 0
    for j in range(n):
        ans = ans + max(abs(arr[j] - 1), abs(arr[j] - m))
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    B = [m if abs(x - m) > abs(x - 1) else 1 for x in A]
    summ = 0
    for i in range(len(A)):
        summ += abs(A[i] - B[i])
    print(summ)

import math
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()[:n]))
    b = []
    k = 0
    for i in a:
        k1 = abs(i - m)
        k2 = abs(1 - i)
        if k1 > k2:
            b.append(m)
        else:
            b.append(1)
    for i in range(n):
        r = abs(a[i] - b[i])
        k = k + r
    print(k)

t = int(input())

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    t = t - 1
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    l = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    final = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans1 = abs(l[i] - m)
        ans2 = abs(l[i] - 1)
        final += max(ans1, ans2)
    print(final)

T = int(input())
for x in range(T):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    c = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c.sort()
    d = min(c)
    e = min(1, d)
    f = 0
    for i in c:
        x = abs(i - b)
        y = abs(i - e)
        if x >= y:
            f = f + x
        else:
            f = f + y
    print(f)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, m) = map(int, input().split())
    li = list(map(int, input().split()))
    li.sort()
    y = min(li)
    y = min(1, y)
    tot = 0
    for item in li:
        d1 = abs(item - m)
        d2 = abs(item - y)
        if d1 >= d2:
            tot += d1
        else:
            tot += d2
    print(tot)
